title: 90/253/Euratom, ECSC, EEC: Commission Decision of 29 May 1990 adjusting the weightings applicable from 1 March 1990 to the remuneration of officials of the European Communities serving in non-member countries
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 29 May 1990
adjusting the weightings applicable from 1 March 1990 to the remuneration of officials of the European Communities serving in non-member countries
(90/253/Euratom, ECSC, EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
With effect from 1 March 1990 the weightings applicable to the remuneration of officials serving in non-member countries payable in the currency of their country of employment are adjusted as shown in the Annex.
The exchange rates for the payment of such remuneration shall be those used for implementation of the budget of the European Communities during the month preceding the date on which this Decision takes effect.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 May 1990.
For the Commission
